item.title: Mary add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Mary add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Mary add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description:
"A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity. It dares all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
<i>-The Last Seance (from The Hound of Death and Other Stories, also Double Sin and Other Stories)</i>" -- Agatha Christie
